subject: Phase 2: Fix registry bloat and deduplication
description:
Cleaned both registry JSON files.

1. `C:\Users\codya\.claude\ledger\hygiene-audit-registry.json` - Reduced from 100 entries to 9 unique entries (deduplicated by project + issue fingerprint, kept most recent). Only 9 unique fingerprints existed across all 100 entries.

2. `C:\Users\codya\.claude\ledger\issue-sync-registry.json` - Backfilled `github_repo: null` on 31 entries missing the field. 77 entries retained (0 removed since no closed entries exceeded the 30-day threshold without valuable data).

Evidence:
- `C:\Users\codya\.claude\ledger\hygiene-audit-registry.json:1` - `[` (9 entries, reduced from 100)
- `C:\Users\codya\.claude\ledger\issue-sync-registry.json:1` - `{ "version": 1, "entries": [` (77 entries with github_repo backfilled)
- Verification: `bun clean-registries.mjs` output confirmed `[hygiene-audit] Entries after (last 10 unique): 9` and `[issue-sync] Backfilled github_repo: 31`
- Grep count of `"github_repo"` in issue-sync = 77, matching total entry count
